positions.subtitle: Sapient
positions.description: • ​​Conducted comprehensive requirement-gathering by understanding the primary concerns of stakeholders, resulting in the development of a tailored DataHub model.• Set up Docker environments for testing and deployment.• Authored Python scripts compliant with industry standards, employing libraries like Pydantic for custom data validation. Ensured "pythonic" coding practices, emphasizing clean and efficient code.• Integrated DataHub with Sapient's existing code repositories, ensuring scalability and seamless metadata ingestion.• Utilized SOLID principles in software design for code flexibility and adaptability.• Gained hands-on UI/UX experience using Figma, designing web pages with an emphasis on user-centric data visualizations.• Collaborated across various departments, enhancing cross-functional communication and team coordination.
positions.title: Software Engineer Intern
positions.description_html:
• ​​Conducted comprehensive requirement-gathering by understanding the primary concerns of stakeholders, resulting in the development of a tailored DataHub model.
• Set up Docker environments for testing and deployment.
• Authored Python scripts compliant with industry standards, employing libraries like Pydantic for custom data validation. Ensured "pythonic" coding practices, emphasizing clean and efficient code.
• Integrated DataHub with Sapient's existing code repositories, ensuring scalability and seamless metadata ingestion.
• Utilized SOLID principles in software design for code flexibility and adaptability.
• Gained hands-on UI/UX experience using Figma, designing web pages with an emphasis on user-centric data visualizations.
• Collaborated across various departments, enhancing cross-functional communication and team coordination.

experience.title: Technical Lead
experience.description: As the Tech Lead, I have overseen our web development projects primarily utilizing the Django framework as part of our tech stack. Leveraging PostgreSQL for our database needs, I've successfully spearheaded the creation of a Progressive Web App (PWA) to enhance mobile user experience.
experience.description_html: As the Tech Lead, I have overseen our web development projects primarily utilizing the Django framework as part of our tech stack. experience.title: Associate Product Manager
experience.description: As an Associate Product Manager, I was in-charge of an AI product which the company successfully launched later. I was later on given responsibilities of testing the products. I performed unit testing and QA. Furthermore, I successfully delivered software automations and web scraping in Python using Selenium. I also got my hands dirty with Data Analytics using Python with modules like Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib and Ngram. Last but not the least, on my journey in the company I developed a software using Python for HR management.

Made prototypes of apps that various products will use.
